DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find effect , good and/or bad , proton radiation combine chemotherapy resect pancreatic cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Postoperative Proton Radiotherapy With Chemo Pancreatic Cancer
DOC.criteria: Histologic proof primary head pancreas invasive adenocarcinoma manage potentially curative resection Post resection CA199 tumor marker baseline Previous history invasive malignancy ( except nonmelanoma skin cancer low intermediate risk prostate cancer ) unless patient disease free least 5 year prior study consent
